caption.p: Serum content of cholesterol and main precursor sterols in SARS-CoV-2 infected subjects. CNT (n = 123): controls; PACP (n = 27): pauci-/a-symptomatic; MOD (n = 36): moderate-COVID-19 patients; SEV (n = 81): severe COVID-19 patients. Mann-Withney U test, *P < 0.05; **P < 0.01; ***P < 0.001 (also see Supplementary Table 1).
